concept.title: Creative Cloud Asset Sharing in Marketing Cloud
concept.shortdesc: You can add Creative Cloud users to your user list in the Marketing Cloud, which enables the sharing of folders and assets to the Creative Cloud.

draft-comment.p: Steve Gustaven - testing. Nandini Gupta is the editorial manager and Vikrant Rai is the content lead for CC docs.

conbody.p: To share assets, users must be members of the tenant (your company name) in the Marketing Cloud. For example, if you log in at <yourcompany>.marketing.adobe.com, the Creative Cloud user must be added to the <yourcompany> tenant.

ul.li: Select and invite Creative Cloud users to the Marketing Cloud (email or web link to the folder)
Create and share Marketing Cloud folders in Assets for sharing assets between the clouds
Synchronize Creative Cloud assets between shared folders
Comment and collaborate on shared assets
Unshare folders after projects are complete
Leverage asset integrations with Adobe Target and Adobe Social for campaigns.

conbody.p: Benefits of asset sharing let you:

ul.li: Streamline creative production workflows in the review, approve, and publish phase
Easily share, save, and send files between creatives and marketers
Spend less time managing in-process files and versions in multiple locations
Track and manage creative assets more effectively
